title: Gauntlet v1.12 + DLC (working online)
description:
================================================================================
Gauntlet 2014 v1.12 + DLC
================================================================================

Multilanguage


================================================================================
About this Jimbus edition:
================================================================================

- Custom installer.
- The game is updated to version 1.12 and nothing has been deleted.
- "Lilith, the necromancer" is included.
- Multiplayer works using Steam.


================================================================================
Instructions:
================================================================================

1. Run the .exe file to install the game.
2. Use the shortcuts the installer creates.


================================================================================
FAQ:
================================================================================

Q: Does the multiplayer work?
A: Yes, it does thanks to Voksi and Revolt.

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: Yes, Steam must be loaded, though the game has to be run from "REVOLT.exe" (use the shortcut).

Q: Does "the Colosseum" work?
A: No, it doesn't.

Q: Does it work under Windows 8.1?
A: Yes, it does. 


Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation
